name: Charlie'sMaze
0:
”Alexa open impossible maze”
”Alexa launch impossible maze”
”Alexa, load impossible maze”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: impossible maze
Developer Terms of Use
des: In this thrilling journey you will need to help a child, Charlie, who ran away from home and got lost in a cave. Being in the dark and all alone, Charlie asks anyone who has entered the game to help him make it through the difficult path. Players receive hints and audio sound effects of the environment, and based on this, they must guide Charlie to safety.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
